channel.title: Terminal commands :: CIS 308 Textbook
channel.description: A side goal of this class is for students to become more comfortable with using the terminal. With practice, you will find that you are faster at navigating folders, creating files/folders, compiling/running programs, using tools stuch as git, etc. using the terminal than you are using a GUI. Familiarity with a terminal is especially useful in system administration and web development. Summary of common terminal commands Here is a summary table of the most common terminal commands for this course:
